code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{addToCart}from'../api/cart';import'./ProductCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductCard(_ref){let{product}=_ref;const[quantity,setQuantity]=useState(1);const handleAddToCart=async()=>{try{await addToCart(product.id,quantity);alert("".concat(quantity,"\uAC1C \uC7A5\uBC14\uAD6C\uB2C8\uC5D0 \uCD94\uAC00\uB418\uC5C8\uC2B5\uB2C8\uB2E4."));}catch(error){console.error('장바구니 추가 실패',error);alert('장바구니에 담으려면 먼저 로그인해 주세요.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.imageUrl,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[product.price.toLocaleString(),"\uC6D0"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quantity-select",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"qty-".concat(product.id),children:"\uC218\uB7C9: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{id:"qty-".concat(product.id),value:quantity,onChange:e=>setQuantity(Number(e.target.value)),children:[...Array(10)].map((_,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("option",{value:i+1,children:[i+1,"\uAC1C"]},i+1))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddToCart,children:"\uC7A5\uBC14\uAD6C\uB2C8 \uB2F4\uAE30"})]});}export default ProductCard;
